long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The PriceEdge Chrome extension work like an extension that brings your competitor and price data into your browser and accessible where you need it. It lets you see your tracked competitors prices and stock levels on top of your own product pages, as well as displaying a price breakdown of how your own price has been calculated.

üõçÔ∏è Track your competitors
List the competitors you want to follow using your PriceEdge account

‚úÖ See competitor data where you need
All your tracked competitors data will show up on top of your own webshops product pages

üôÖ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Understand why your price is what it is
See breakdown of how your prices have been calculated, included what rule was used and what competitor that might have been followed.

Please note that you will need a PriceEdge license to configure and use this Chrome extension.
